summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3825 for the improvement of 33rd Avenue South, from Day Street to Charles Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all under Ordinance No. 47016, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
